d: The mission to take back the Earth begins now. —Hassen
Lave the rest to me.
With Immune Serum and pain receptors disconnected, we can continue to execute our mission.
Open your eyes and see the humans for who they really are through this person. I look forward to your choice after learning about the truth...
To ensure the victory in the War Zone, Gray Raven decided to head further into the zone.
Lucia can fight again thanks to the Construct's arm.
Traces of graffiti. Facing such eerie artwork, Liv decided to join the battle.
Try to fight with Liv!
In the simulation replay, all Gray Raven saw were the Corrupted feasting on their comrades...
Artistic creations?
Lucia turns silent for a short while after receiving the plushie, staring at it with an unmoving gaze.
If you're lost, then simply walk forward. Walking forward itself can be meaningful enough.
These graffiti surprisingly captivated a lot of these Corrupted...
Hehe... this is just... for a little... base coloring...
I... am a free machine.
Be cursed... by... my... work...!
Indeed... Walking the path of heavens... The Construct who will rule everything... My name is... Nanami!
This signal... The Construct's named "Tifa"?
This is the leader of the Cerberus squad.
No, I remember now... Yes, this reeks of her, we've been played.
This Inver-Device... Tifa took it off herself.
That's a... survivor from the Suzaku squad!
Corrupted gained new abilities by corrupting the Iso-Devices.
The team received a signal from a Construct requesting aid. Help him as soon as possible.
Wait for me, Tifa... I'll... bring you back to... Babylonia...
This is the last area linking to the Portal. A safe route can be set up here only.
What a fool. With Ascendant's power, I will fulfill the last wish of my commandant...
—and shot a bullet into her point-blank.
Among those hypocritical and disorganized humans, I'll find an appropriate... one to be the... seed...
This is the Museum Estate. The Ascendant traces ended here.
A colossal blade whirls past—Then I'm going in! Hiya—
Helping people makes me feel good!
Even though we encountered a little trouble, we managed to get into the Estate.
What secrets is the Estate hiding? And what exactly is the inheritance?
That must be the Ascendant.
A new variant, along with many Corrupted reinforcements, suddenly appeared in the Estate. Pass through this courtyard ASAP.
Only Lucia can soundlessly destroy enemies.
We'd better be mentally prepared for... whatever's coming.
I thought you were... a good guy.
Is that what you think... Did you not notice that my target was you from the start?
After Kamui regains consciousness, the remaining task for Gray Raven is how to escape from here.
The calculation result is... there are no routes...
Take cover! Baby's gonna blow!
The heavy agriculture machine falls to the ground with a thud, its speaker keeps repeating something, as if calling out for someone.
There's Punishing Virus reaction beneath the sand!
Vassago, a kind of aggressive bionic Sand Worm.
Identity... deserter?
Next time we meet, we'll be enemies.
When Gray Raven almost escaped, Liv was captured by the Forsaken.
You kidnapped me. For this, you face the risk of warfare with Babylonia.
In order to take Liv back, Gray Raven decided to split up.
That gift—the box of wild mint.
Without Liv, Gray Raven can only stay in place and wait for Kamui's results.
This doesn't look like a biosphere... It's more like the... M.I.N.D.
As the Gray Raven has figured out how the EM projectors function, it is time to find and disable them.
This is a souvenir Murray gave me, a mini graviton detector.
As turning the devices off by hand is too inefficient, Lucia has proposed adopting Strike Hawk's method.
With my help, projector breaking's gonna be twice as fast!
The Corrupted are doing an organized retreat suddenly. Gray Raven has realized that they might be controlled by someone else.
Who do these imprisoned consciousnesses in the M.I.N.D. Test Area belong to?
It's a friendly signal. Did support come?
Gray Raven found the Forsakens and Liv deep inside the M.I.N.D. Test Area.
Watanabe, I need an explanation...!
Connect to Liv's M.I.N.D., Commandant. Only you can save her now.
After resting in a Forsaken camp for a night, Gray Raven has received a new mission from Babylonia.
Gray Raven has to go toward City 019 around 30km away.
These are the marks of resistance from the people.
Nanami suddenly appeared to join the battle of Gray Raven and the new type of Corrupted.
The concentration of Punishing Virus is skyrocketing as the team ventures further. Liv has noticed some abnormal behavior in a member.
Kamui suddenly left without a single explanation.
Please decide quickly. Some of the Corrupted on the production line have awakened.
...Nanami, I order you to help Watanabe!
De... tecting... thermal... reaction... purify...
Lead everyone out after the detonation.
Kamui, when were you first corrupted?
Right before the Purifying Force executed the mission, Strike Hawk had connected in.
The leader of Strike Hawk had made up his mind to save Kamui. In order to break the deadlock, Bianca was willing to make temporary concessions and help to find Kamui in the ruins.
Gray Raven encountered a group of aggressive Corrupted under the ground.
Gray Raven has returned to the entrance because of the Corrupted's interference. They have to map the best route ahead.
He's Rohacchi, Nanami's pal!
Without a trace of Kamui, Karenina quietly left the team.
She's going after Kamui on her own.
Traces of battle between Karenina and Kamui can be found on the way following the tracks of Karenina.
When Gray Raven found Karenina, she had already lost consciousness. Liv found abnormal energy inside her... same as the one inside Kamui.
A form of energy is trying to invade Karen's M.I.N.D.
The enemies were coming at Gray Raven once Karenina's condition was stabilized. Seeing that they moved in coordination, there must be someone behind them.
We meet again, Babylonians.
Defeat the Ascendant first!
With the authority of the Babylonian Council, I order the Gray Raven squad to withdraw immediately!
With the "help" of the president, Gray Raven have obtained supplies and continued on their way.
The situation has been getting worse. Gray Raven decided to sneak in with a special method.
Deep inside the ruins, Gray Raven encountered Nozzle, the robot that should have already been retrieved.
After Nozzle is the robot butler of the same model as the butler back in the Estate. It seems that "someone" does not want Gray Raven to find Kamui.
It proved that those Corrupted were made by Roland through some unknown means. Suddenly, Lee left the team just like Kamui had done.
Lee's not responding to my connection, something's wrong.
You'll pay for this.
How'd you guarantee that it ain't a monster coming out of that tin can?
I'll never be strayed by anything, I'll only follow my own will. I have not lost yet!
I did it with my will and fought so from the beginning till now!
Because, you are me, and I am you. We're both Kamui.
This war will likely determine the future direction of the world.
A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and care—
The contents of the signal... were lines from a play... Shakespeare's "The Tempest".
At least for now, we're using each other.
Cells infected by bacteria or viruses will be... destroyed and discarded...
If there is any danger, Commandant, please wake us immediately.
This high-density body plans to give Gray Raven a lesson.
The Prism is now ready.
Selena said some information was related to the design of these... rings.
Coated man. Floating Cube.
The cross ahead is named the Punishing Heteromer.
We had a discussion and decided that I would be the best candidate to fire the Prism.
Watanabe turns and runs toward the gravity room's exit.
The folks prayed to a certain being that they would find peace at the end of their journeys.
Akdilek Commercial Alliance... Wait, this diagram, is a train?
Are you surprised? Construct Tech is not something only Babylonia has.
After all, that is our most valuable merchandise.
We can't afford to wait any longer.
Golden Apple System, activate!
Aww, you're not using the motorcycle I especially prepared for you? And it's a really cool design too...
I don't plan to abandon any one of you... It is not my intention for anyone to get hurt.
There's no use in finding the culprit now... Let's find the way to the carriage.
As expected, Sophia has figured out the "satisfying" answer in her heart.
I can be a good merchant too!
The Eternal Engine got back on track after destroying the "goods".
Fate never favors anyone... There is no eternity, Aston.
I have confirmed the status of the "goods". Are you ready for delivery?
The Nighter. The oriental ship that only pulls in at night.
Looks like you're in big trouble, Gray Raven.
The familiar ceiling doesn't come to sight when opening eyes. It is a locked secret chamber and there is an unusual sign of connection.
The only related text was about "Opera", an art form that existed in the pre-pandemic human world.
Canned pupa! Three grubs a can!
Who kidnapped the commandant? The answer might be hidden on the ship that left the port.
No, that thing's called "Huaxu".
Lucia, you look great in this outfit!
The audience feasts their eyes on this pair of embodiments of oriental beauty.
And how can you be so sure? Machines are merely lifeless creations of mankind, devoid of emotions and thoughts.
With Lucia as the vessel, Huaxu will become the perfect existence.
I don't understand love. I am the one who deprived you of your freedom, who always controlled you...
The ship drifts. Everyone trains their sights upon the sea's surface, an azure painting glittering under the morning sun.
The team is preparing for the experiment of a new frame in Babylonia while discussing the future directions.
Apart from the new frame, Asimov is also preparing another secret weapon for Nikola.
The Ascendants gather together and prepare to head toward the battle that will decide their fate.
After a seemingly endless wait, the Nighter was finally coming ashore.
The crew weren't welcomed, but rejected instead.
The real Huaxu must not fall into the hands of Ascendants. Babylonia forces started gathering.
In the arctic land, the fisher was urging the sailor to hurry. Forest Guards were chasing after the Corrupted.
Everybody had their own plan. Except Babylonia.
The joint operation between Cerberus and Strike Hawk didn't seem to be going well.
The actions taken by different parties only further accelerated the war.
It was complete mayhem in Kowloong City. They seemed to have underestimated the Ascendants.
War was imminent. Gray Raven made a promise.
Never underestimate the Support Force! —Bridget
The two Lucias met again in Kowloong City.
Seriously wounded, Lucia was removed from the frontline for recovery, while Gray Raven received an unexpected reinforcement.
Two leaders were having a conversation in a station.
As an Ascendant, Lamia specialized in manipulating her enemies.
Qu decided to take one step further for the Corporation.
In order to rescue fellow comrades, Strike Hawk was forced to confront Lamia.
Strike Hawk's effort wasn't wasted. Kowloong guards decided to join forces against Lamia.
Lucia was already on her way, so Strike Hawk decided to first create a path.
A golden powder was seen on the battlefield between Cerberus and Roland.
The train was getting close to Kowloong—
Far away from the battle, Lucia woke up—
Gray Raven managed to get through the light wall, only to be greeted by Kowloong's defense force.
There were also different opinions within the light wall. What would happen...?
Gray Raven met Qu in the tower and discovered Kowloong's real intention.
On the Observatory Plume shone bright.
It was over... For now.
Information saved
Information saved
Information saved
77.3% of the conventional engines have been forcibly shut down. Babylonia is falling!
The virtual space looks completely normal, but there is something hidden underneath.
You encounter unexpected events, both friendly and hostile... both commanded and improvised.
False is false.
Veritas ends in pursuit.
Is relationship and bond between people strong or frail?
Finally, there is a hope to break the deadlock.
All signals come to a screeching halt here.
No matter who "it" works for, you've got to make it stop.
The crisis in Babylonia is lifted temporarily. And everything returns to normal.
If you see something too dangerous, don't let curiosity get the best of you.
It seems that we will maintain this perspective until the end of this mission.
Projections of Corrupted, the Corrupted, growths of punishing...
The four of you gaze into the red tide of life and death, just like how it gazes back.
Looks like... this commandant must have been dead for over a week.
They seem to be lured by the "sound of the flute" and submerge in the sea of crimson.
These Corrupted have started to develop biological traits. Simply calling them "Corrupted" would be inaccurate.
In order to survive, we have to decide what to accept, as difficult to bear as they are... That's the price.
Please don't hate me.
...Will I become someone like her?
Carefully, Liv opens the faded cover, and a white petal falls out onto her hand.
There are more traps ahead, so be careful.
I would still have some foolish hope had that never happened.
It's up to you to decide when to let Lucia get that memory back.
It's not that it was abandoned... It was never even occupied.
Go back to the source—to the abyss.
The broken remains remind you of "corpses."
Since our guests have arrived at the door, there is no reason not to entertain them.
Then, let me be your mission support from now on.
A blindfolded queen, an advisor, and a beast.
Or is this another "test" of yours?
Can you really put that blade of yours in Luna's heart?
If these weaklings are your "final plan," I must say I'm quite disappointed.
Miss Luna, this is my answer to your question—
Whether in sight or out of sight, the Support Sorce are always working.
What does the appearance of Huaxu's projection here really mean?
Be careful of that Lucia.
Lucia... Quickly! Commandant's going to...
I will accept your everything—your pain, your choices.
Don't worry, you'll be the next.
Before falling into complete silence, Lucia clutches the nameplate in her hand...
The shards of each other's memories cross the boundary between them, like fragments of glass pouring down after it breaks, scattering in front of their eyes.
Running your mouth when you're so lost and miserable. Is that who you are now?
This is your reward for facing your past.
Welcome back, Lucia.
Underneath this behemoth is a lake composed of the Red Tide, shimmering in its fearsome scarlet glow.
If it was not Murray, who is it?
It is impossible to find Lamia by blindly searching, so this is the time to check the tips.
Hee hee, take it—it's Lamia's petty concern.
Lamia has nowhere to run.
Only cracked and shattered rocks remain when you arrive at the epicenter.
Miss Luna... Please serve your final duty as an agent...
Besides, Gray Raven is at its best when we are together, right?
"Go, complete your task."
Battle is the only option against the roaring Polyphage.
This time, I'm choosing to believe in "myself."
Despite the many enemies ahead of her, Lucia knows the bullets and beams coming from her teammates will clear her way.
The end... is nigh!

Head to [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 1 to find [Cordis Die 2] event
Head to [Babylonia Bridge] Floor 2 to find [Cordis Die 3] event
Head to the deep of [Babylonia Bridge] Floor 2 to find [Cordis Die 4] event
Head to [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 4 to find [Cordis Die 5] event
Head to the deep of [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 4 to find [Cordis Die 6] event
Head to [Babylonia Bridge] Floor 2 to find [The Hiddens 1] event
Head to [Parliament Square] Floor 2 to find [The Hiddens 2] event
Head to [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 3 to find [The Hiddens 3] event
Head to [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 4 to find [The Hiddens 4] event
Head to the deep of [Dominick Memorial Park] Floor 4 to find [The Hiddens 5] event
Head to [Eden 16-B] Floor 3 to find [World's End 1] event
Head to [Parliament Square] Floor 2 to find [World's End 2] event
Head to [Babylonia Bridge] Floor 3 to find [World's End 3] event
Head to [Parliament Square] Floor 3 to find [World's End 4] event
Head to [Safe Zone] and find [Additional Review] to expand Memory 1
Head to [B01 Industrial Sector] Floor 3 to find [Memory 2] event
Head to [Safe Zone] and find [Additional Review] to expand Memory 3

Head to [Core Area] Floor 3 to find [Tide Direction 2] event
Head to [B01 Junction Corridor] Floor 4 to find [Tide Direction 3] event
Head to the deep of [B01 Junction Corridor] Floor 4 to find [Tide Direction 4] event
Head to [Relic of Business Park—Block 3] to find [Blood Well 1] event
Head to [Area A Ruins Square No. 97—Garden] to find [Blood Well 2] event
Head to [C-07 Abandoned Chemical Plant—Operation Zone] to find [Voiceless Self 1] event
Head to [Supply Carriage] to find [Voiceless Self 2] event
Head to [C-07 Abandoned Chemical Plant—Warehouse] to find [Voiceless Self 3] event
Head to [C-07 Abandoned Chemical Plant—Operation Zone] to find [Voiceless Self 4] event
Head to [Breaking Platform—the Deepest] to find [Blasphemy 1] event
Head to [Safe Zone] to find [Blasphemy 2] event
Head to [Polyphage Left Hand—Floor 1] to find [Adverse Impact 1] event
Head to [Polyphage Left Hand—Floor 2] to find [Adverse Impact 2] event
Head to [Polyphage Body—Floor 1] to find [Faith Praises 1] event
Head to [Polyphage Body—Floor 3] to find [Faith Praises 2] event
Head to [Polyphage Body—Floor 2] to find [Faith Praises 3] event
Head to [Polyphage Body—Floor 3] to find [Engraver 1] event
Head to [Polyphage Body—Floor 2] to find [Engraver 2] event
"Be careful with your words and action. Don't do anything now. Wait until morning to inspect the room."
"Where did you get the Ascendant data?"
Feels like we're being watched.
Maybe there's an easier and more straightforward way.
Like a dark abyss, the pinhole spy camera on the button gazes at Chrome, who is holding it in his palm.
Mom... is resting.
We don't get to do this everyday. Let me give you a bonus question.
He speaks with no lofty words and acts like a modest teacher before his enemies.
The rumbling underneath the floor announces death like a countdown timer.
Kamui spots a faint smile on Chrome's face before Chrome completely loses consciousness.
If we ever settle this, we will need the talented commandant to help us build a future for humans.
Looks like some people are leaving no stone unturned, considering they've bugged our transport craft, too.
The dim light from the sky nourishes the surrounding red trees, and root-like pipes coil around them, revealing a peaceful but strange atmosphere.
Sorry... For leaving you alone to deal with such a thing.
Even if the signal is broken, and even if hope is scarce, I will run to you no matter what. That's salvation, as well as saving myself.
As long as we're on this ship together, nothing will remain a secret forever.
The red-haired Construct stands amidst them proudly like a rose above its thorns.
That's right. The city you're standing in was once a zero-point reactor.
It once contained humanity's hope for a utopia, after all.
If the Golden Age is a crown, then this is one of the brightest jewels on it.
I've... finally found it.
Humans have long died on the road to their ambitions. This city is just a graveyard for their arrogance.
Atlantis lived, and so did they.
Don't tell me the city's haunted.
I believe humanity will have a bright future.
I wouldn't, because I want to find out what is there at the end of the darkness.
Who would have thought that, in the end, I'd go gentle into that good night?
Vera knows that gaze intimately. The look of total desperation was once in her eyes as well.
Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
The mark of the World Government which bears the hope of humanity appears at the top of the room with dignity. Another "World Government Conference" is about to start.
Science is a torch that lights the way to humanity's future, not a wind that fans the flame of some civil war.
The logs have been arranged from left to right chronologically by Liv. Your fingertip flips over a page, and another memory is reawakened in your mind.
Asimov stops tapping on the projection and points toward one point on the globe.
The humanoids slowly turn around, their strangely-shaped feet crushing the bones on the ground, making an eerie, squeaking noise.
Hans is not very loud, but his voice is firm enough to reach every one of your ears, making you all stand straight.
Your head is slowly recovering from the spike of adrenaline, but you can still hear the voices of Hetero-Sapiens from all corners of the Forest Park Ruins, warning you not to let your guard down.
He winds up the war machine that is you all, the elites of Babylonia, and you march on toward CPF 040.

The Central Purification Filter that was the basis of humanity's life on the surface against the Punishing Virus is now penetrated by the crimson plants, erected in the middle of the field, twisting and towering.
Their gaze pierces through the crowd and extends toward the species you belong to—humanity.
In the last few moments before you fall unconscious, you hear thunderous explosions.
I will be back. Trust me.
The war between humanity and the Punishing Virus begins anew, here and now.
This is the never-ending cycle of despair.
Our Parliament was established to build a better future for humanity.
We are forced to step into the eternal night of death, and with different language and bodies, roar as one in the afterburn of dawn.
However, they are not the greatest threat nor are they the ultimate fruit borne from disaster. They are just a road sign.
We were forced to stand on a sinking island, all of us.
In any case, this is the beginning of hope, but it is only just the beginning.
What happened to the girl and the boy is not an exception. We have different life experience but share similar nature and feelings.
"Together they come, and when one sits alone with you at your board, remember that the other is asleep upon your bed."
Anything that you are not happy about? Or are you still expecting your commandant to get up all of a sudden and tell you there is a new tactic that sacrifices no one?
The originally crowded basement is now left with only dozens of people waiting for Gray Raven to come back.
By the light of the daybreak, they see that the sloped path in the city has turned into a scarlet wave.
"And what is it but fragments of your own self you would discard that you may become free?"
But there is no "would have."
"It is life that gives unto life."
"Who can depart from his pain and his aloneness without regret? It is not a garment I cast off this day, but a skin that I tear with my own hands. Yet I cannot tarry longer."
Even though there is not much time left, she still sticks to her post.
Gray Raven, Strike Hawk, and Cerberus gather in City 47 to plan for their next move.
We didn't know back then that the train was heading to the end.
We must be ready. This battle will decide the fate of all of our lives.
I think I heard someone laughing...
To seize the only hope, the girl has turned into a gentle monster.
Dusk and silence, exhaustion and wounds, they weave together a web that binds the two of them to the bench they are sitting on, with no hope to escape.
"With a will to give it all and an unyielding spirit to keep going."
"The mist that drifts away at dawn, leaving but dew in the fields, shall rise and gather into a cloud and then fall down in rain."
In this world, there is no rescue no matter when you make your prayers.

"Only when you drink from the river of silence shall you indeed sing. And when you have reached the mountain top, then you shall begin to climb. And when the earth shall claim your limbs, then shall you truly dance."
―Start from the "death" of self and move into the future.
― Start from the "death" of self and move into the future.
The data cache in it will control the form of the Punishing Virus. Think of them as Hetero-Sapiens or Red Tide Projections. They will transform with your cognition.
"Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself. She melts herself for her desires to be like a running brook that sings its melody to the night."
Nanami will travel with her friends! Where to go...? We'll see!
Nanami knows that there are still warm places in this cold world!
Maybe not every journey has a happy ending, but that's the exact reason why Nanami will still keep looking.
Nanami met a mysterious big sister. I always feel like I saw her somewhere, but I also feel like that I will only meet her in the future.
Nanami doesn't like the answer. I don't like the coldness or the quietness... But where can I find the future that makes everyone smile?
The world will be reconstructed. A different future is waiting for Nanami, but will it be the future Nanami wants?
Why... Why the war? Aren't we friends...?
Although these machines called Nanami "Sagemachina", Nanami never wanted the war...
Nanami will find a future without war and hand it to the humanity.
Nanami has only one thing to do...
Then let Nanami... break the cage!
For Nanami's friends and our future together, Nanami has to try again and look for the real answer.
Nanami will never forget the pain of machines and humanity... So Nanami is determined to seize the opportunity no matter what it takes.

N: Find the Answer in the Future
d: Nanami is determined to fight the storms of fate!
Guys, I need to go now... I'm starting my journey now.
Nanami will find the unique future herself.
I wish you to find the real answer... Goodbye, Nanami.
Her last bow.
Start by... collecting Nozzle's memory chips, right?
This world... what happened to it...
This way... he will... understand me...
Liv connects herself to the tattered remains of Tifa—
I... my body...
Tifa gazed at the mechanic head with an enchanted expression... "Hah, what a piece of work"...
Tifa ignores Kamui, and leaves before the bridge collapsed entirely.
Hm. Finally. My stop.
Then I'll help myself.
You seem to be enjoying yourself a little too much.
Ascendant trails extended all the way here!
You might still be useful.
Try to restore Zack's iconic memories, if possible...
Zack, do you think the rabbit's right? Or the donkey's right?
Wait... Miss Emma's signal appeared in the courtyard...
The enemy... is strong... Stronger than... Zack...
Aren't they coming with us?
The last plane leaves the inner garden.
This is a M.I.N.D. testing site from the old world. We'll have to reach the core area of this building.
Watanabe confessed to Liv that the Forsaken needed her power for one thing.
Just a little more and...
Liv, hold on! We'll... find a way to...
Only if she could find her way back to her M.I.N.D.
The pseudo-consciousness of Liv reforms itself, and attempts to close off the M.I.N.D. entrance...!
Because machines would never waver in their faith, they proved more reliable than any normal human believer.
But have you ever seen this many plump and well-fed kids queuing up?
Tch, stingy old hag...
A pair of bladed wings spread out of her back. She leaps and dives into the Corrupted-filled abyss down below.
Well, I'm not going back anyway. Might as well play a little with this power.
Serving God and humans as a machine for my entire life, was there even any meaning to this?
This is Rohacchi's memory data I copied from the ruins. Now rendering it into visual data for replay.
The visual data shows that Rohacchi clashed with the Ascendant.
When Rohacchi was escaping, it has sensed its "companions".
Friends! From now on Rohacchi and Nanami will be good friends!
Looks like Rohacchi's awakening has something to do with that mysterious mural.
In the end, we couldn't find any relevant information about the murals...
Chrome, too... He knows full well I'm not familiar with these things.
I went deeper into the ruins.
Camu said that those Corrupted were originally after me.
Can you believe this? Beneath the ruins so deep underground, is another big and spacious... space!
Almost there.
Goodnight, the other me.
Ayla inhaled a deep breath and started to focus, trying to receive or sense any possible signal from Selena.
There is where Selena failed.
The carcass suddenly jerks, as if she had felt Ayla.
Heads up, the Corrupted are invading!
Hetero activity detected... It's similar to the egg hatching process of an arthropod.
Enemies have been swarming towards Changyu on the train roof. Sophia decided to split up from Gray Raven in the nick of time.
While you, on the other hand, rest.
Changyu's situation is a bit dire and requires emergency maintenance.
The parts of the external mechanic arms can be replaced with the mechanical equipment lying around.
Don't worry, I'm Executive Officer Nikola's agent.
Don't move. First, let's fit your head through this hole in the dress...
They're all trapped in this place, yet they're excited as ever for this event. Are they controlled too deep—or are they poisoned by this dream?
Two similar yet vastly different souls sit together, back to back, seeing entirely different worlds.
The dream wasn't good enough. That's all.
The Forest Guards followed the Corrupted to Kowloong City.
Who was the real prey? Cerberus, or Roland?
"I want you to join us in this battle, Rosetta."
Finally, it was time for Cerberus to strike back.
Lamia owed Watanabe a favor.
The war was coming to an end. Everybody had their own thoughts and plans.
Gabriel's giant arm pierced through Qu's chest...
A rusty bridge extends out into the distance, its other end enveloped by the fog. Even though she cannot see it, Alpha knows where the bridge leads.
There's no turning back for us.
That's not only death for the living, they can also kill those phantoms that have passed away and remain in memory.
Roland, I know what you are going to say. I've never brought it up because this wish will never come true.
Let's end it here, Gabriel.
I'll say this again. The road you've chosen has but one ending—absolutely nothing!
There needs to be uncertainty in the world for it to be interesting, isn't that so?
Lucia, I used to think of you only as a chess piece leftover from a conspiracy, a piece of data that was previously deceived and had no reason to exist.
Let's just call her Lamia then.
She's so ugly, like a monkey. Can we get her to stand up?
No medicine can help you.
A warm hug and comfort will be given to every weeping child.
I understand. It's "curiosity."
Stop dawdling. Come here, we have to make you adapt to your body right away.
We aren't devoid of weakness. We were just forced to "send" it away.
Atlantis lived, and so did they.
A wanderer walks among the ruins of the city.
I think you'll be interested in the show, Roland.

The forest in front looks like the Garden of Eden, where all the creatures live together in harmony. It is proudly showing off the lives residing within.
An unknown dark cage, some trapped beasts, a vague target.
Before he can finish his sentence, the vine pulls him down into the shaft.
These exposed red spheres rotate from time to time among the branches, watching from the shadows everything happening inside the tower.
Something has opened its eyes amid the chaos.

N: Center of the Show... Or Not?
d: The audience usually doesn't get to enter the stage... But accidents happen.
The wanderer walks on the desolate battlefield.
I promised Mother and Father that I would never let anyone hurt you. So, I'll take the risks...
Where did these two little girls come from...?
Sister, are we finally safe?
Blame your own naivety.
We don't have a choice...
Lucia held Luna in her arms. They fell asleep together for the last time in the cold room...
Only at the end of a long darkness you will find happiness. And we are no different.
Her black long hair, along with a few tags in her clenched fist, are the only things swaying in the warm wind...
That's why I need her... to stay loyal to humanity.
Alright. Now is the time... to welcome another lady home.
It's impossible! The goddamned Corrupted... and Punishing Virus!
Lucia barely held on to her blade as she stumbled across the city.
Lucia almost collapsed into Luna's arms. Tears ran down her cheeks.
I want to meet her.
This was how I met that person.
I learned many things from Commandant...
Lee, Liv, myself, and Commandant. We are Gray Raven.
Sometimes... I had flashback of memories of Lucia.
I felt sorry for everything. That's why I must keep moving on.
Be my blade, Plume.
It was a conversation with Commandant, hidden deep in my heart.
I'm sure we can get along, right?
Live, can you find that white dress for your sister? I'm sure you can do such an easy task, right?
...I can stay back and take care of our home.
Let me go to the war zone. Please.
Aren't you going to... have a few words with her?
Please answer my question.
Get changed, Liv... At least, you should leave beautifully. You can do it... I'm sure.
Nanami's got a diary book today!
Nanami will live happily ever after. Just like daddy and mommy...
Everybody has stopped going to class. Daddy and mommy also stayed home.
I... must... fight...
Why are there... machines... in Nanami's arm?
We have lied to you...
From now on, Nanami's alone...
Make sure you wait for Nanami! I'll be back!
Even scavengers cannot survive on this barren land.
We are friends. Always are!
A scavenger had witnessed some Construct in the hunting ground.
All this attacking and robbing... Are we really that different from the Corrupted?
Tell her that we are thankful... and sorry.
I... still don't really understand what it means to live, but well, I'm not human to start with.
You can have this robot on your birthday, Murray.
Thirty seconds is enough for a simple gun modification.
Mini Bot… will accompany you... if Murray is not here...
I'm willing to pay any price... I just want... Murray to live.
Leave all the risk to me.
You'll be fine. Everything will be fine.
That dancing robot is still incomplete.

N: Crazy Old Nutter and Little Dummy
d: They say you are crazy, but you are the only one who has cared for me.

Someone will soon come here and take us to a safe place.
More and more people are coming to Snow Plain Church in this arctic land.
I'm willing to give everything... even my life.
Take them to somewhere safe before the blizzard comes again.

Follow your heart, my child.
God, if I ever lose myself, I am willing to accept any judgement and punishment.

Keep it up. I'm sure you'll make your dreams come true before long.

Large-scale missions are always exciting.
The first team of Task Force is the most powerful.
They always fight relentlessly, as if fighting is the sole reason for them to exist.
This is a large scale mission to eliminate Corrupted.

Among liquid and parts, the sparks bid farewell to a friend under the setting sun.

"Hyena" was no longer "Hyena". She became soft-hearted and adorable, all because of the... "family".

Hurry up, Leader! Let's go together.
A warrior fears not wounds nor bleeding.
"Isn't she... the Redheaded Death?"
At the medic station, Vera raised her hand with determination to fight at the front lines.

Vera was locked in the detention room for the fighting with the Constructs calling her the death.
Instead of following the orders, Vera decided to do what her heart said—protect the city at all cost.
Vera and other soldiers were overwhelmed by the Corrupted. She painfully realized what she should do now.
Taking away Tifa's pain was all Vera could do for her.
Like his master said, Camu accepted the serum injection and became a Kurono soldier.
Camu and his companions were dispatched to the mobile fleet. During their missions, they realized how cruel the world was.
The serum did not stop a soldier from dying. Camu discovered something when he delivered the goods to Kurono.
What had to be burned down was not only the city occupied by the Corrupted, but also the "Corrupted" themselves.
Grasping their weapons with rage, Camu and his companions marched to Kurono's base.
This was a battle between the Constructs and the Corrupted. Surrounded by blazing flames, everything fell into darkness.
"I'd like to see how you live through this world, Kamui."

There is no place more prosperous than this.

Huainan saw a clear reflection of himself. He paused for a moment, then pulled his collar down to reveal a terrible scar on his neck.
The cheering noise of the crowd could be heard from far away. Lanterns slowly rose into the sky from the deck. The Nighter looked like an grand, unreal show from the window.
Numerous dark silhouettes with crimson eyes walked out of the fire. What were they? Changyu stared at the burning flame, trying to find out what happened...

Huainan stood right in front. His hair was messy, and his dark eyes had no emotion in them. Changyu had never seen that look. He felt like there was ice in Huainan's eyes, and he would be devoured in the next second.
"I had no evidence... But somehow I just had this feeling that he was still somewhere in the world. People like him would do anything to achieve their goals."
It rests peacefully under the Kowloong Metropolis, where it should remain undisturbed.

The monarch will merely be a facade created out of authority before the masses.

Because we're a "flag."

An unpublished interview report.

A thousand memories flood in with a painful sorrow.

For she hears the audience's innocent call, and she hears the performers' tender reply.
The lovely girl told. She had wandered long, hearing that performer's song.
The girl and her friends raising their innocent hands. Now like a mighty wind they raise to heaven the voice of song.

The feeling of empathy is life, strength, and breath.
Youth of delight! Come here and see the opening morn, image of truth new-born.

Hundreds of years passed in the flutter of a butterfly's wings, and I sigh when I look back at the past. Spring has just arrived today, yet the flowers will wither tomorrow. Drink before the night ends and the lights go out.
I used to drink wine and enjoy music for days and squander my money just for fun. It is after I bid farewell that I realize how much time I have wasted away.

The plum tree branches cross the moon, creating a special atmosphere. The plum blossoms shade the moonlight, leaving dot shadows in the glass. No matter how I lament the past, those days have long gone. It's hard to see my old friends again.

It was drizzling and windy last night. I slept in but still felt drunk. I ask the maid who is rolling up the shades, yet she tells me that the flowers are still in blossom. Don't you know that there should be more leaves than flowers?

I wish to bid farewell, but my words fail me. He departs from me into the flowers and grass. There I stand, waving goodbye to him. The cherry blossoms are still in bloom and the willow leaves are still abundant, yet the wind of spring is blowing in the cold rain.
The silk handkerchief is soaked by the sudden burst of tears. It's hard to resist the sadness of not being able to see him. My sleep is shallow, yet the screen stands tall in this silent long night.
We are separated by the Yangtze River. One stands on the north bank, and the other stands on the south bank. With whom should we drink wine and admire the moon tonight?
